app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Trulinco Translator
app_description: Trulinco is a full fledged business communication app that provides real time translation across 200 languages during messages calls with accuracy. It also allows document image text translation with accuracy across 200 global languages. Our Mission: Provide a high tech platform to break the language barrier and serves accuracy in translating any documents image text message voice calls or video calls. The focus is to establish seamless effective communication globally! Our Vision: To unite the people across the world irrespective of their languages. Advanced Features: Text Chat Translation Instant Chat with Real time translation in your language. Voice Call Translation Seamless Voice Call translation in your language. Video Call Translation Smooth translation during Video Calls. Group Call Translation Business meetings with people speaking different languages. Image Text Translation Scan images for instant translation in your language. Documents Translation Upload documents and get instant translation in your language. Privacy Policy https: trulinco.com privacy.html Terms of use https: trulinco.com terms of use.html
